bibl.title: The Grapheion and the Disappearance of Demotic Contracts in Early Roman Tebtynis and Soknopaiou Nesos.
Tebtynis und Soknopaiou Nesos. Leben im römerzeitlichen Fajum. Akten des Internationalen Symposions vom 11. bis 13. Dezember 2003 in Sommerhausen bei Würzburg
bibl.note: The same 'hellenized' Egyptian officials were responsible for both the Demotic and the Greek texts at the grapheion. The prescription of Greek subscriptions, rather than a negative proscription against the use of Demotic, was probably responsible for the extinction of Demotic contracts by the end of the 1st century AD.
